name: Aim Trainer Pro
description: Aim up and improve your shot. The ultimate FPS training solution to help you warm up faster, includes many target practices for the beginner or the pro.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2 GHz or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel integrated graphics 3000 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: 3 GHz or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
